name: Rabbit Mania
description:
Do you like games with no glitches? games that are fun and easy? games that are simple and need no thinking?
well if you said no to these questions then Rabbit Mania is for you
Prepare yourself for a frustrating journey where you control a rabbit that has been kidnapped by aliens
and wants to escape
features:

* Fun yet frustrating levels
* increasing difficulty 
*a unique death mechanic
*a variety of puzzles and traps 

Can you beat it? PLAY IT NOW!!!

Warning!!! play it in your own risk
